code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createPayment}from'../api/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Payment(){const[payment,setPayment]=useState({bookingId:'',amount:''});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await createPayment(payment);alert('Payment successful');}catch{alert('Payment failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Booking ID",onChange:e=>setPayment({...payment,bookingId:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Amount",onChange:e=>setPayment({...payment,amount:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Pay"})]});}export default Payment;
